title: Understanding the Save As Function
text: When saving a file in Excel, you can choose different file types. This is done through the 'Save as type' dropdown menu.

title: What is a Template?
text: A template in Excel is a pre-designed file that can be used as a starting point for new workbooks. It often includes formatting, styles, and sometimes data.

hintAnswer: same as saving a workbook, except the file type (Excel template) is selected in 'Save as type' box
title: Steps to Save a Template
text: To save a template, follow the same steps as saving a workbook, but select 'Excel Template' in the 'Save as type' box.
choices: same as saving a workbook, except the file type (Excel template) is selected in 'Save as type' box
same as saving a workbook in general
same as workbook except for renaming the file name
